[meadowrun]

Develop locally, run on the cloud

Get started Github

Seamless

Run your ad-hoc jobs and scripts on the cloud as easily as you run on your laptop. No need to learn a complex set of concepts specific to each cloud provider.

Scale

Scale up to a bigger machine, scale out to multiple machines, or both, without getting bogged down in details you don’t care about.

Iterate

Your local code and environment is synchronized to cloud machines. Make changes locally and they’ll take effect immediately.

Control costs

Use spot instances whenever possible, and truly scale down to zero so you only pay for what you use. Never worry about realizing that you’ve been paying for a rogue instance that didn’t get cleaned up.
